descr:
Description
      







SIZE: 50MLSKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPES | SENSITIVE SKIN | ACNE-PRONE | DRY SKINIDEAL FOR: SOOTHING | INTENSE HYDRATION | NOURISHING | REGENERATE SKIN | BLEMISHES | ANTI-AGING | STRENGTHENS SKIN BARRIER | DARK SPOTS | HYPERPIGMENTATION | ELASTICITY  |ANTIOXIDANT PROTECTION | FINE LINES | WRINKLES | GLOWING | RADIANCE | CALMING IRRITATION  FORMULATION: CREAM | LIGHTWEIGHT |VEGAN | PARABEN FREE | FRAGRANCE FREE 
Dr. Althea 345 Relief Cream is a lightweight, nutrient-rich gel-cream designed to soothe, nourish, and regenerate the skin while addressing acne aftermath, blemishes, and signs of aging. Enriched with Niacinamide, Panthenol, and Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract (10,000ppm each), it strengthens the moisture barrier, regulates oil production, fades dark spots, and provides deep hydration for dry and sensitive skin. The addition of Resveratrol delivers powerful antioxidant protection, enhances cell turnover, and improves elasticity, while Adenosine smooths fine lines for a glowing complexion.
The formula also features Centella Asiatica Extract and plant-based hydrators that calm irritation, alongside Calendula Extract, Sunflower Extract, and Propolis to provide long-lasting moisture and nourishment. Its multi-layered cream structure ensures continuous hydration without a greasy residue, making it suitable for sensitive skin. Vegan-certified and EWG Green Grade-rated, it is free of parabens, sulfates, artificial colors, animal products, alcohol, mineral oil, and fragrance, prioritizing both skin and environmental safety.
HOW TO USE





Wash your face with a gentle cleanser suited for your skin type.


Apply less viscous skincare products like toner first.


Apply an adequate amount of the 345 Barrier Cream as your final or semi-final step in your skincare routine.



***For external use only. Always patch test before use to check for sensitivity. Discontinue if irritation occurs, and consult a dermatologist if needed. Results may vary depending on individual skin type and condition.


INGREDIENTS
Key Ingredients:


Niacinamide: Enhances skin's moisture barrier, regulates oil production, brightens skin tone, and fades dark spots.

Panthenol: Provides hydration, soothes and repairs irritated skin.

Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract: Moisturizes and helps improve skin elasticity.

Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract: Antioxidant-rich, brightens skin and reduces inflammation.

Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract: Calms and heals the skin, promotes collagen production.

Sodium Hyaluronate: Powerful humectant that draws moisture into the skin, hydrating and plumping.

Adenosine: Soothes, reduces the appearance of wrinkles, and promotes collagen production.

Tocopherol (Vitamin E): Antioxidant that protects the skin from free radical damage.

Ceramide NP: Helps restore the skin barrier and retain moisture.

Water, Propanediol, Glycerin, Cyclohexasiloxane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Polyglycerin-3, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Hydrogenated Polydecene, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract, Sargassum Fulvellum Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Perilla Ocymoides Leaf Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Empetrum Nigrum Fruit Juice, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, C14-22 Alcohols, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Dipropylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyquaternium-51, Tromethamine, Fructooligosaccharides, Adenosine, Beta-Glucan, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, PEG-40 Castor Oil, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Resveratrol, Tocopherol, Ceramide Np, Oligopeptide-1, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate

SIZE: 55gSKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPES IDEAL FOR:  DARK SPOT BRIGHTENING | FADES PERSISTENT BLEMISHES | INTENSE HYDRATION | SKIN TEXTURE | SKIN BARRIER STRENGTHENING | ANTI-AGING | ELASTICITY  | UNEVEN SKIN TONE | HYPERPIGMENTATION | CALM IRRITATION | RADIANCE | GLOWINGFORMULATION: CAPSULE CREAM | HYPOALLERGENIC | DERMATOLOGIST TESTED | PARABEN FREE | SULFATE FREE | NON STICKY
Medicube Deep Vita C Capsule Cream is an innovative skincare solution designed to brighten, firm, and refine skin while addressing uneven tone and dark spots. Its unique dual-texture formula combines a Vitamin Capsule cream with a transparent gel, allowing for customizable application tailored to your skin's needs.
The Vitamin Capsule is infused with 50% Sea Buckthorn Extract, 5% Niacinamide, and Pure Vitamin C, encapsulated for maximum freshness and potency. The transparent gel component, enriched with Ferulic Acid, Vitamin E, and Q10, delivers deep hydration and enhances radiance with minimal irritation. Formulated with stabilized liposome technology, this cream ensures optimal Vitamin C delivery for superior results. 
Dermatologist-tested and hypoallergenic, it offers gentle yet powerful care, making it suitable for sensitive skin. For best results, incorporate it into your daily routine and follow up with sunscreen in the morning to maintain a bright, radiant complexion.
HOW TO USE



Massage a moderate amount into the skin at the last step of the skincare and dab for better absorption.

***For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken or inflamed skin. Keep out of reach of children. Use with care for easily irritated skin. Always patch test before use to check for sensitivity. Discontinue if irritation occurs, and consult a dermatologist if needed. Results may vary depending on individual skin type and condition. Store in cool and dry places, away from direct sunlight.


INGREDIENTS
Key Ingredients:


Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Water: Rich in Vitamin C, brightens skin and provides antioxidant protection.

Niacinamide: Evens skin tone, reduces pigmentation, and strengthens the skin barrier.

Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C): Powerful antioxidant that brightens skin and promotes even complexion.

Panthenol: Hydrates, soothes, and improves skin barrier function.

Adenosine: Smooths wrinkles and enhances skin elasticity.

Tocopherol (Vitamin E): Moisturizes and provides antioxidant protection.

Sodium Hyaluronate: Deeply hydrates and plumps skin, reducing fine lines.

descr:
Description
      











SIZE: 3.4cm x 17.7cm | 1.3in x 6.96in | 155g | 5.46ozSKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPES | SENSITIVE SKIN | OILY | DRY | DULL | COMBINATION SKIN IDEAL FOR: SOOTHING | ANTI AGING | BRIGHTENING | IMPROVE SKIN TEXTURE | INCREASE ABSORPTION | REDUCE PORE VOLUME | REDNESS | SMOOTHING TEXTURE | RADIANCEFORMULATION: SKINCARE TOOL
The Medicube Age-R Booster Pro is an advanced at-home skincare device designed to create electro-passageways, enabling deeper penetration and enhanced absorption of your skincare products for maximum benefits. It is the ultimate beauty device with 6 technologies in one.
Clinically proven to deliver remarkable results after just one use, it increases skin permeability by 490%, enhances glossiness by 574%, reduces pore volume by 285%, refines texture by 68%, minimizes temporary redness by 28%, and improves skin tone. Developed in collaboration with dermatologists, this innovative device helps unlock the full potential of your skincare routine, leaving your skin healthier, smoother, and more radiant.
For optimal results, follow the included user manual for specific techniques and consult a doctor if undergoing medical treatments or experiencing any irritation.
**All sales are final. No returns, refunds, or exchanges. 
WHAT IT DOES
Radiance without marks on the skin

No bumpy marks, No recovery time needed! Bring out the skin's natural glow with AGE-R Booster's deep absorption technology. 
AGE-R Booster creates temporary passageways on the skin layer, rapidly passing active ingredients, helps to bring back skin radiance.

Over-voltage, overload protection

Automated shutdown system in case of over-voltage or overload 

CLINICAL TESTS

Slim | 465 - 525nm

Skin permeability increase 490%
Skin glossiness improvement 57.4%
Skin pores volume improvement 28.5%
Temporary improvement of skin redness 2.8%
Skin texture improvement 6.8%
Skin brightness improvement 0.6%

*Clinical Trial Tested by the Tego science.’ / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.

WHATS INCLUDED

AGE-R Booster-H
User Manual
USB Charging Cable





HOW TO USE
 1. Prep Your Skin

After washing your face, gently apply the skin care product on your whole face.
Press and hold the power button to turn on device.
Briefly press the power button again to select intensity level (Level 1-5 available).
Press the power button twice to choose your desired LED mode.
Start on level 1 when first using the device.
Choose the level that works best as you continue using the device to glow from within!


2. Different Modes


Booster mode: Electroporation
Booster mode helps absorb active ingredients and delivers them while boosting radiance. Utilizes electroporation more stable utilization of electroporation, creating temporary fine holes for the maximized absorption of active ingredients.

MC Mode: Microcurrent
MC mode helps to volumize facial linesMicrocurrent targets the areas around the eyes, smile lines, and mouth

Derma Shot Mode : EMS
Derma Shot mode stimulates sagging skin and care for muscles to create a firmer facial contour Facial contour care by applying mid-frequency EMS optimized for facial muscles to stimulate muscles that have lost elasticity.

Air Shot Mode: Electric needles
Air shot mode helps improve pore elasticity by creating non-damaging passageways on the skin layer with electric needles. Electric needle technology forms micro holes and improves pore elasticity.

Customized Vibration Care
Different vibration patterns for each mode provide a more professional and effective care.

Radiance boosting vibration : Vibrations are designed to help the skincare product absorb deeply.

Line smoothing vibration : Vibrations are synchronized with the lifting motion.

Facial contour vibration : Vibrations are suitable for muscle care.

Pore elasticity vibration : Vibrations are intended for comprehensive pore care.

3. Glow Boosting

When the skincare is absorbed, finish with intensive care.
Fill up radiance and glow from within.
Use it every day in your skincare routine and enjoy the afterglow!

***Do not use on bare face. It is strongly recommended to use it with skincare products such as serums and creams.
All sales are final. No returns, refunds, or exchanges. 
ABOUT BRAND
Medicube is committed to delivering clinically proven, dermatologist-developed solutions for sensitive, acne-prone, and troubled skin. The brand formulates effective skincare using safe, tested ingredients to address concerns like dryness, dullness, and enlarged pores. Made in Korea, Medicube ensures trustworthy, high-quality care at every step of your routine—so you can focus on yourself, not your skin concerns.
Kbeauty is an authorized retailer of Medicube

Its unique seven-layer hyaluronic acid system provides deep hydration across multiple skin layers, leaving skin plump and revitalized. With azulene and ceramides, the cream soothes irritation and evens out skin tone, delivering a moisturized finish without greasiness. Free from artificial fragrances, colorants, and preservatives, this cream is a clean, effective solution for sensitive and dry skin.
HOW TO USE





Wash your face with a gentle cleanser suited for your skin type.


Apply less viscous skincare products like toner first.


Apply an adequate amount of the 147 Barrier Cream as your final or semi-final step in your skincare routine.

SIZE: 7.78 fl. oz | 230ml  SKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPE | SENSITIVE SKIN | DRY SKIN | COMBINATION SKIN | IRRITATED SKINIDEAL FOR: INTENSE HYDRATION | SKIN BARRIER STRENGTHENING | CLINICAL EFFICACY | 120-HIUR LONG -LASTING HYDRATION | SOOTHES DAMEGED SKIN | SAFE FOR BABIES | FACE & BODY CARE FORMULATION: CREAM | MIDE FORMULA | SOFT & MELTING FOMULA | CERAMIDE CAPSULE | NON-STICKY | CLEAN INGREDIENTS | UNSCENTED |  VEGAN | HYPOALLERGENIC | EYE IRRITATION TASTED 
Illiyoon Ceramide Ato Concentrate Cream is a hypoallergenic, intensely hydrating, and soothing cream for the face and body. With a patented ceramide skin complex, this cream will provide instant moisture for dry and sensitive skin. It has a non-greasy and quick-absorbing formula. Ceramide capsules melt into the skin upon contact. The skin's barrier will be strengthened and protected from environmental factors. Great for sensitive, dry, and dehydrated skin, especially during the colder months. 
HOW TO USE
Apply on cleansed skin and gently massage in.
For external use only. Always patch test. Discontinue use if you feel any discomfort. Follow additional instructions on the packaging. Individual results may vary.

title: COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Intensive Cream

descr:
Description
      







SIZE: 150ML ( 30ML + 20ML + 30ML + 30ML + 30ML )SKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPES | SENSITIVE SKIN | OILY | DRY | COMBINATION SKIN | DULLNESSIDEAL FOR: SOOTHING | ANTI-AGING | BRIGHTENING | NIACINAMIDE | CENTELLA | EXFOLIATING | SEBUM CONTROL | PORE CARE | ELASTICITY | FINE WRINKLES | UNEVEN SKIN TONE | BARRIER REPAIR | INTENSE HYDRATING | CALM IRRITATION | RADIANCE | GLOWING | ANTIOXIDANT | ANTI INFLAMMATORY | FORMULATION: TONER | AMPOULE | CREAM | CLEANSING OIL | HYPOALLERGENIC | NON COMEDOGENIC | PARABEN FREE | SULFATE FREE | ARTIFICIAL COLOUR FREE | NON STICKY
This travel kit consists of:

Madagascar Centella Toning Toner 30mL
Madagascar Centella Ampoule Foam 20mL
Madagascar Centella Ampoule 30mL
Madagascar Centella Soothing Cream 30mL
Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil 30mL
No travel bag included. 

PRODUCT DETAILS
1. Madagascar Centella Toning Toner
A lightweight exfoliating toner that gently removes sebum and dead skin cells while restoring the skin’s pH balance. Enriched with centella asiatica extract, PHA (a mild exfoliator), niacinamide for brightening, adenosine for wrinkle improvement, and hyaluronic acid for deep hydration. Certified brightening & anti-aging benefits for clear and elastic skin. Non comedogenic test complete, safe for acne skin and all other skin types.
How to Use① After cleansing, apply with a cotton pad or hands.② Pat gently for better absorption.
2. Madagascar Centella Ampoule Foam 20mL
A rich pH-balancing ampoule foam cleanser that deeply purifies the skin without stripping it (pH level of 5). Formulated with fine baking soda powder and coconut-derived surfactants, it effectively removes impurities and makeup while keeping the skin hydrated. Contains Centella Ampoule that soothes and balances skin.
How to Use① Dispense an appropriate amount and lather into foam.② Massage onto the face and rinse with lukewarm water.
3. Madagascar Centella Ampoule 30mL
SKIN1004's signature ampoule that is anti-inflammatory, hydrating, repairs the skin barrier, calms irritation, and restores the skin’s moisture and oil balance. Made with pure Madagascan  Centella Asiatica extract, which is 7 times more soothing than other centella, for maximum soothing benefits.
How to Use① After toner, apply 2-3 drops onto the skin.② Gently pat for full absorption.
4. Madagascar Centella Soothing Cream 30mL
An instant cooling and fast-absorbing moisturizer that locks in hydration and strengthens the skin barrier, while calming and relieving skin redness, especially for sensitive skin. Contains 3 essesntial components to firm skin and promote a smooth, healthy complexion: Ceramide, Cholesterol, and Fatty acids. Balances damaged skin with the closest pH level of healthy skin.
How to Use① As the final step of skincare, apply an appropriate amount evenly.② Lightly tap to enhance absorption.
PRODUCT TEXTURE 


Centella Light Cleansing Oil – Lightweight, water-like oil that effortlessly removes impurities without leaving residue.

Centella Ampoule Foam – Creamy paste that transforms into a rich, dense foam for a deep yet gentle cleanse.

Centella Toning Toner – Clear, watery formula that absorbs quickly without stickiness.

Centella Ampoule – Slippery, fast-absorbing serum that hydrates without leaving a greasy finish.

Centella Soothing Cream – Non-sticky and lightweight gel-cream with a silky texture that glides smoothly and locks in moisture.



***For external use only. Always patch test before use to check for sensitivity. Discontinue if irritation occurs, and consult a dermatologist if needed. Results may vary depending on individual skin type and condition.


INGREDIENTS
Key Ingredients:


Centella Asiatica Extract – Soothes inflammation, promotes wound healing, and strengthens the skin barrier.

Glycerin – Deeply hydrates and maintains skin moisture balance.

Butylene Glycol & Propanediol – Humectants that draw moisture into the skin, keeping it hydrated.

1,2-Hexanediol – Preservative and humectant with antimicrobial properties.

Niacinamide – Brightens skin, improves texture, and controls sebum production.

Adenosine – Reduces fine lines and wrinkles while boosting skin elasticity.

Hyaluronic Acid & Sodium Hyaluronate – Deep hydration and plumping effect for a youthful glow.

Sodium Bicarbonate – Helps remove impurities and balances pH.

Coptis Chinensis Root Extract – Antioxidant-rich and anti-inflammatory, soothes irritated skin.

Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil – Balances sebum production and hydrates.

Tranexamic Acid – Brightens skin and helps with hyperpigmentation.

Ceramide NP, Ceramide AS, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP – Strengthen the skin barrier and prevent moisture loss.


Centella Ampoule
Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cellulose Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin
Centella Toning Toner
Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Sodium Citrate, Gluconolactone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Disodium EDTA, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Betaine, Hyaluronic Acid, Carbomer, Tromethamine
Centella Ampoule Foam
Water, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Coco-Betaine, Centella Asiatica Extract, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Cocotate, Potassium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-67, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Dextrin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Acetate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Coptis Chinensis Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cnidium Monnieri Fruit Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract

Centella Soothing Cream

descr:
Description
      







SIZE: 50MLSKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPES | SENSITIVE SKIN | DRY SKIN | OILY SKIN | DULL SKIN | ACNE PRONEIDEAL FOR: BRIGHTENING & BLEMISH | POST ACNE HEALING | INTENSE HYDRATION | RADIANCE  | STRENGTHEN SKIN BARRIER  | HYPERPIGMENTATION | SKIN TONE | EVEN SKIN TEXTURE | REDNESS | BOOSTER PRO WITH SYNERGISTIC EFFECTSFORMULATION: CREAM | WATERY REXTURE | HYPOALLERGENIC | NON-COMEDOGENIC
Achieve clear, hydrated, and radiant skin with this advanced moisturizer formulated with 58 powerful ingredients, including Niacinamide, Salmon PDRN, AHA, ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and peptides. Designed to erase blemishes and prevent future ones, it strengthens the skin barrier, brightens dull skin, and improves discoloration and blemish-prone areas.
Featuring 10 layers of hyaluronic acid, it deeply hydrates and forms a robust moisture barrier, while Niacinamide and PDRN improve skin tone and texture. With a lightweight, non-sticky texture, this cruelty-free and reef-safe moisturizer is perfect for acne-prone, sensitive, dry, and oily skin, offering benefits for anti-aging, pore reduction, scar healing, and brightening.
What is PDRN?
Salmon DNA PDRN Salmon PDRN is a form of DNA extracted from salmon. The extraction process isolates small DNA fragments that are highly compatible with human skin cells due to their structural similarity to human DNA. This compatibility enhances the skin’s natural barrier, making it stronger and more resilient. *The above information pertains only to the characteristics of the raw materials
HOW TO USE



1. At the last stage of skincare, apply a moderate amount to the skin.2. Gently pat for better absorption.

***For external use only. Always patch test before use to check for sensitivity. Discontinue if irritation occurs, and consult a dermatologist if needed. Results may vary depending on individual skin type and condition.


INGREDIENTS
Key Ingredients:


Betaine: Hydrates and reduces skin irritation.

Niacinamide: Brightens skin, reduces redness, and minimizes pores.

Adenosine: Smoothens wrinkles and improves skin elasticity.

Hyaluronic Acid Complex (Various Forms): Deeply hydrates, plumps, and retains moisture in all layers of the skin.

Centella Asiatica Extract: Soothes irritation and promotes healing.

title: MEDICUBE PDRN Pink Hyaluronic Moisturizing Cream 50mL

descr:
Description
      







SIZE: 50MLSKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPES | SENSITIVE SKIN | OILY | DRY | COMBINATION SKIN | DULLNESS | ACNE PRONE SKIN IDEAL FOR: WRINKLES | PIMENTATION | SKIN TEXTURE | TROUBLE SKIN | ANTI-AGING | BRIGHTENING | PORE CARE | IMPROVES TEXTURE | INTENSE HYDRATING | CALM IRRITATION | NOURISHING | ELASTICITY | BRIGHTENING | RADIANCEFORMULATION: CREAM 
This advanced anti-aging cream harnesses the power of 1% Retinal Liposome and Lactobacillus/Rice Ferment to reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven skin tone while improving elasticity and brightness with minimal irritation.
Formulated with Bakuchiol, Vitamin C & E, and 3 types of Peptides, it supports collagen production for a firmer, smoother complexion. The Liposome delivery system ensures deep penetration for maximum effectiveness, while Centella Asiatica and Panthenol provide soothing hydration and strengthen the skin barrier. Enriched with 5 herbal root extracts and Lactobacillus/Panax Ginseng Root Ferment Filtrate, it delivers antioxidant protection and calms the skin. The smooth, creamy texture absorbs quickly without stickiness, leaving skin soft, radiant, and refreshed.
Suitable for all skin types, especially aging and mature skin, and ideal for addressing wrinkles, pigmentation, texture, and troubled skin.
HOW TO USE




Apply a pea-sized amount of the cream to your face and neck as part of your nighttime skincare routine.
Start using 2-3 times a week, gradually increasing frequency as your skin adjusts.
Always use sunscreen during the day when incorporating retinoids into your routine.



***For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken or inflamed skin. Keep out of reach of children. Use with care for easily irritated skin. Always patch test before use to check for sensitivity. Discontinue if irritation occurs, and consult a dermatologist if needed. Results may vary depending on individual skin type and condition. Store in cool and dry places, away from direct sunlight.


INGREDIENTS
Key Ingredients:


Retinal Liposome (1%): An advanced form of Vitamin A that stimulates collagen production and accelerates skin renewal.

Tocopherol (Vitamin E): Antioxidant that protects skin from free radical damage.

Bakuchiol: Plant-based retinol alternative that reduces fine lines and improves skin texture.

Niacinamide: Brightens skin, reduces hyperpigmentation, and improves barrier function.

Lactobacillus/Panax Ginseng Root Ferment Filtrate: Energizes, revitalizes, and promotes skin elasticity.

Lactobacillus/Rice Ferment (1,000 ppm): Brightens and evens skin tone while providing antioxidants.


Centella Asiatica Extract: Calms irritation and supports skin healing.

Panthenol (Vitamin B5): Hydrates and soothes the skin while improving its barrier function.

Allantoin: Soothes and calms irritation while promoting skin healing.

Adenosine: Reduces wrinkles and improves skin elasticity.

Ceramides: Restore and strengthen the skin's protective barrier.

title: KSECRET SEOUL 1988 CREAM: Retinal Liposome 1% + Fermented Rice 50mL

descr:
Description
      







SIZE: 3.38 FL OZ | 100MLSKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPES | SENSITIVE SKIN | DRY | OILY | COMBINATIONIDEAL FOR: BLEMISH RECOVERY | INTENSE HYDRATING | BRIGHTENING | PANTHENOL | BAMBOO | HYALURONATE | CALMING | NON-IRRITATING | REPAIRS SKIN BARRIER | NIACINAMIDE | DEWYNESSFORMULATION: CREAM | LIGHTWEIGHT | VEGAN | CRUELTY FREE | FRAGRANCE FREE | EARTH CONSCIOUS | HYPOALLERGENIC | DERMATOLOGIST TESTED
Purito Seoul Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cream is a skin-repairing moisturizer formulated with 10% Panthenol and Korean Damyang Bamboo Extract to strengthen the skin barrier, reduce moisture loss, and deliver long-lasting hydration. Infused with Squalane to boost moisture levels and Niacinamide to brighten and smooth, this cream supports sensitive skin with a hydration improvement of 44.63% and a 118.47% increase in moisture retention. Clinically tested for sensitive skin and hypoallergenic, it’s vegan, cruelty-free, and free of synthetic fragrance—making it a gentle, barrier-restoring essential.
HOW TO USE


For Skin Barrier Repair: Take an appropriate amount and apply evenly to the face and neck, patting gently to aid absorption. For more effective skin barrier repair results, we recommend using this in combination with Defence Barrier pH Cleanser.

For Additional Care Moisture Layer: Before bed, apply 2-3 times more than your usual amount to the face in two separate layers. Allow the first layer to absorb fully. Then, apply the second layer to create a moisturize seal to help your skin feel hydrated and strong.

***For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken or inflamed skin. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use retinol products during pregnancy or breastfeeding. Use with care for easily irritated skin. Always patch test before use to check for sensitivity. Discontinue if irritation occurs, and consult a dermatologist if needed. Results may vary depending on individual skin type and condition. Store in cool and dry places, away from direct sunlight.
INGREDIENTS
Key Ingredients


Panthenol (Vitamin B5): Deeply hydrates, soothes irritation, and strengthens the skin barrier.

Squalane: Moisturizes and softens the skin while reinforcing the skin's lipid barrier.

Niacinamide: Brightens skin tone, reduces the appearance of pores and dark spots, and improves skin texture.

Bambusa Vulgaris (Bamboo) Extract: Rich in antioxidants; helps calm, hydrate, and support the skin barrier.

Sodium Hyaluronate: Provides deep hydration and plumps the skin by retaining moisture.

Water, Panthenol, Squalane, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tromethamine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassoside, Asiaticoside, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid, Copper Tripeptide-1
*This list of ingredients represents all options or variants of this product. Actual ingredients in a given product option may vary from this list.
*Ingredients subject to change at manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients, please refer to product packaging or manufacturer's website.
ABOUT BRAND
Purito SEOUL aims to deliver gentle yet effective skincare by combining traditional Korean ingredients with clinically backed actives, catering especially to sensitive skin. Rooted in Korean heritage, the brand focuses on soothing and revitalizing formulations, like its Centella-based Wonder Releaf line, to address redness and irritation. With a commitment to vegan, cruelty-free, and conscious formulations, Purito SEOUL creates inclusive skincare solutions designed for everyday skin health.
title: PURITO SEOUL Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cream 100mL

descr:
Description
      







SIZE: 20MLSKIN TYPE: ALL SKIN TYPES | SENSITIVE SKINIDEAL FOR: FINE WRINKLES | ANTI-AGING | ROUGH TEXTURE | UNEVEN SKIN TONE | ELASTICITY | PORESFORMULATION: LIQUID CREAM
COSRX The Retinol 0.1 is ideal for first-time retinol users and those looking to prevent and correct early signs of aging. It is suitable for those concerned with wrinkles, fine lines, and loss of skin elasticity. It also benefits acne-prone skin by helping to reduce pore size and improve skin texture. 0.1% pure retinol fades appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Panthenol provides hydration, leaving the skin supple. Tocotrienol (Super Vitamin E) has antioxidant properties which refresh the skin. This product is artificial fragrance-free.
HOW TO USE

After using essence or serum, pat a small amount using your ring finger. Apply evenly over the face, neck, and onto parts with wrinkle concerns. Limit initial use to three times per week; gradually increase frequency to every other night, use as tolerated.
If you have sensitive skin or if you are new to vitamin A products, we recommend adjusting the amount or frequency. When using this product for the first time, apply a small amount to your skin, and monitor for any reactions. Slowly increase the amount used until you find the appropriate balance for your skin.
Always patch test. Use only as directed. Do not use on broken skin. Avoid use when pregnant or lactating. Avoid using immediately after exfoliating. Avoid use together with vitamin C or acid products. If skin irritation occurs while using this products, reduce the amount or frequency of use and discontinue use if irritation persists. Follow additional instructions on packaging. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where retinoids have been applied with sunscreen. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration. Individual results may vary.

INGREDIENTS

Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Glycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Trehalose, Panthenol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Glyceryl Stearate, Polysilicone-11, Sodium Sulfite, Tocopherol, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Retinol (0.1%), Allantoin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Tocotrienols, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Palmitic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Sorbitan Isostearate, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, BHT, Beta-Carotene, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Glutathione, Sodium Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate.
